sentences.en: " Me thought the germ of it was dead in me!
sentences.cn: “ 我还以为喜悦的胚胎已经在我心中死掉了呢!

sentences.en: A germ is the earliest form of a living thing.
sentences.cn: 胚芽是生物的最早形式.

sentences.en: Add Oreo crumb and wheat germ and blend well.
sentences.cn: 搅奥利奥饼和小麦胚芽进芝士内.

sentences.en: All the possibilities of any life are in the germ.
sentences.cn: 形成任何生命的一切可能都在胚胎里面.

sentences.en: Extraction of oil from the wheat germ defatted wheat germ.
sentences.cn: 脱脂肪麦胚是小麦胚提油后的产品.

sentences.en: Honesty is the germ from which all growth of nobleness proceeds.
sentences.cn: 诚实是高贵得以发展的芽.

sentences.en: It contains the germ of the whole.
It's just the germ of an idea, but something may come out of it.
sentences.cn: 这只是个初步的想法, 但是也许能有所成就.

sentences.en: Little real understanding of the germ theory can be ascribed to surgeons.
sentences.cn: 外科医生很少对病菌理论真正有所理解.

sentences.en: Put disinfectant down the toilet to kill any germs.
sentences.cn: 在抽水马桶里投放消毒剂杀菌。

sentences.en: The normal mice gained weight; the germ - free mice stayed lean.
sentences.cn: 正常的鼠变胖, 而无菌鼠保持了体重.

sentences.en: This beetle eats mainly the germ of the grain.
sentences.cn: 这种甲虫主要吃谷物的胚芽.

sentences.en: This germ is found on things used by the patients.
sentences.cn: 这种细菌附着在病人使用过的东西上.

sentences.en: This was the germ of a book.
Wheat germ oil may be replaced with flax seed oil.
sentences.cn: 小麦胚芽油可用亚麻籽油取代.

sentences.en: You let strangers put their germ - filled mouths on your uterus?
sentences.cn: 你让陌生人把他们满口细菌的口舔你的子宫?

phrases.tran_cn: [生]种质；胚质；生殖细胞的细胞质；遗传物质
[比喻]处于初级阶段，处于萌芽阶段

trans.tran_cn: [生]幼芽，胚芽，微生物；细菌；病菌，起源，胚胎
trans.tran_en: a very small living thing that can make you ill
